description: This file defines a CardPresenter class responsible for creating, binding, and unbinding recipe card views in an Android TV application. It manages view appearance, image loading via Glide, and card background color updates based on selection state.

classes.name: CardPresenter
classes.description: A Presenter subclass that renders recipe data as a card image in an Android TV UI, handling view creation, data binding, unbinding, and background color updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder containing an ImageCardView, initializes background colors and images, and sets focus properties.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Recipe object to the card view, setting title, content text, image, and dimensions.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Clears image content and badge from the card view when unbinding.

methods.name: updateCardBackgroundColor
methods.description: Updates the background color of the card view depending on whether it is selected.
